name: Cygnus: Baby Train of Death
description:
You play as the White Mage who came across a physical game in the gold mines. Your job is to push a big red button to stop a baby from reaching the fire. Good luck.

Features:

  • A big red button!
  • A baby!
  • White Mage!

Not featured:

  • Cygnus
  • Beam guns

I'm bored and the university is putting pressure on me, so I (hastily and lazily) made this game in 3 days. And yes, I know that this game looks "somewhat" familiar to a minigame from a particular comedic game I could name.
